name: Basilisk (kifner-mateusz)
description:
Fresh out of the shell, Basilisk is running away from the dangers of the contemporary world, as his immunity levels and sanity are at the edge.

Low effort game indeed, and kinda playable... kinda, quite literally.

Well... if something has crashed, know this... this game is a result of low effort programming, during night hours. Lead programmer made some mistakes, mistakes that cannot be understood by a human being.

Memory leaks may vary per user.

Cheers and may someone bless your soul,

The Basilisk Team
